title: New Skin for Taric The Shield of Valoran
body:
Hello Gems Army .
 
Here are some nice skin concepts:

https://us.v-cdn.net/5021068/uploads/editor/8c/pzq6n36lsysy.jpg

Star Guardian Taric.

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRKOUfFHjC7uw2YBMQQHMKb8vIzfNZ3s-9RkxsHBVCUrNTceJEuww

Debonair Taric

Maybe Dragon Slayer Taric or Academy Taric ? 

He has a very big potential for a new skin in my opinion . :) 

^^
Even Pentakill Taric sounds like a great new skin . Imagine Taric as a vocalist with a microphone in his hand and a black jacket  , this skin concept is my favorite bcs he fits perfectly but its only my opinion . 
https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS3aK_zBFoaHCp1aX5bvqyJU3OpOFbQdLXn_GHYrP7T9yVvPiAkPQ
-
I hope all the Taric mains will support this post.
Rito is working on new skins so now is the time to talk about a new skin for him.

And if u have other skin ideas just post it here .
I would love to read your opinions and to see how “truly outrageous” you can be.{{champion:44}}

replies.body:
Please not Debonair Taric...
My sexuality can't handle this much
Surrender urself to Taric’s charm hahah
My problem with debonair is that you can see the other debonair skins in the background of his fifth age splash art.

Taric would go just to acknowledge his own beauty
















































and ezreals
actually tho, im surprised taric doesn't have a debonair skin
We can make it happen brother .{{summoner:14}} ty for ur post

> [{quoted}](name=ZiLess,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dn0ZmW5p,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-12T13:26:49.115+0000)
>
> actually tho, im surprised taric doesn't have a debonair skin

Debonair is in the same universe as Armor of the Fifth Age Taric that's why.
But people can change clothes though.
Well yea but that's not how skins works in league.

Meh.

Dragon Slayer Taric seems too similar to Bloodstone. I don't want it to become a skin.

Star Guardian is phenomenal and would fit really well with Star Guardian Ezreal (the running Ezreal X Taric gag)

Debonair is nice too.

Personally I want a Cardmaster Taric skin.

His E could be something like him shuffling a deck and then firing them off into a blast, His ult could make it rain Poker chips etc. etc.
I think he has a big potential for a Legendary skin and maybe Star Guardian can be that skin , you never know. 👍🏻
Nah, Urgod will get that sweet Legendary Star Guardian Skin
No, that will taint the skin line. Urgot won't get a Star Guardian skins unless it's a Definitely Not Star Guardian with him in bad cosplay around April Fools.
Then Gragas is better as Star Guardian? xD
He's in the same boat as Urgot (though with the two of them, it'll start sinking...), so no to that.
Yea I know... then Taric is a better candidate for Star Guardian skin then other male champions
xDDD
Take our money Rito , we are ready for a  high quality Taric skin {{champion:44}}
I would like to see a kitchen theme skin for him , Taric with a “man bun” hairstyle cooking would be funny and awesome at the same time haha{{item:3086}}
I'm down if he's wielding a skillet and more so if it makes that sweet, sweet "KLANG" when he hits things with it.
Master chef Taric! :lol:

I would really like to see celestine/arclight taric or demon taric as long as he was portrayed as an incubus 😉
edit: also if you must waste one of his skins on pentakill he better have good looking hair for once (which is the only good thing about kayles skin)

I don't know exactly what theme, but I'd like to see something a bit more rugged, maybe with armor. Personally I'd like a Dragon Slayer theme, or maybe Warden. As of now the only skin that resonates with me is Emerald Taric. I think armor of the fifth age could use some chromas. That's my two cents.

Same here. I'd like to see Taric in full armor again. 
Perhaps instead of Warden they can show us what he looked like as a Demacian soldier.
Preach Brother ! :)

I always thought that Taric should have an outer space themed skin. Instead of gems he should have planets that orbit him, his cape should be more like Rakans cosmic dawn skin where it's like looking into the cosmos. His Q is a sun that rains down light to heal, W attaches 3 of his 6 planets to orbit his ally, E can be stars in a straight line and his ult can be a meteorite that falls from the sky and once it hits him/his allies they turn  dark purple with speckles of stars seen inside, it would be distinct so that enemies know that they are invincible. 
His hammer can have astral crystals attached together, and his wardrobe can be very similar to the Star Guardian one here.
This could be his legendary that he desperately needs, Cosmic King Taric could be the name. He always talks about stars and outer space so it's like his own voice lines beg for him to get a skin like this. 
EDIT: I almost forgot to mention he basically radiates, like the beautiful man he is. {{champion:44}}

Cleric Taric 
Bodyguard Taric
Jewel King  Taric
Cyborg Taric
Soulstone Taric
I'd like to see Woad Taric where he has red hair and is all Celtic. I'd also like to see Arclight Taric so he can finally have his Paladin skin. Since he is the most paladin-like character.

> [{quoted}](name=Haziv,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dn0ZmW5p,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-06-12T12:54:49.784+0000)
>
> Imagine Taric as a vocalist with a microphone in his hand and a black jacket

Yeah but Karthus is Pentakill's vocalist I could see him as well as Kayle but I definitely like the concept
taric star guardian is beautiful!!!
O.M.G... Debonair Taric is, literally, the skin I never knew I wanted.
New skins for Darius and Garen hmm... why not God King Taric Riot?  Taric who has a eagle as a spirit animal . Well maybe next time we will have more luck . :):)

Whoever made that splash art for SG Taric deserves a job at Riot.

Although..wth is that coming out of his left hand?

Your "Dragonslayer" skin is fan art of his old Bloodstone skin. It's not a skin concept.
http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Taric_3.jpg
Ty for your post Oleandervine , i will change it now . Tell me ur opinion , what new skin for Taric would you like to see?
